name: Userstyles.org Remixed
description:
ï£¿ Update 10.10.2010 - Fixed widths


Isn't Userstyles.org original style just too lame and old-fashioned?

Here's a new style for you, my fellow stylers! Preview: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9813327/userstyles.jpg

Features:
 - Complete, modern Web 2.0 Redesign
 - Before & After images now merged, visible on mouseover (http://userstyles.org/styles/21365)
 - Ads NOT removed

Full resolution preview http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9813327/userstyles.jpg

Idea from Drake (http://userstyles.org/styles/19082).
